snippet.title: SONIC RIDERS DX V2.0 IS OUT NOW | Showcase Trailer
snippet.description:
DOWNLOAD SONIC RIDERS DX V2.0 HERE: https://sonicfangameshq.com/forums/showcase/sonic-riders-dx-version-2-0.1336/

Sonic Riders DX is a competitive mod for 2006's Sonic Riders for the Gamecube that enhances the game's core mechanics and design with gameplay tweaks, bug fixes and gear balance. On top of that, DX includes new characters, new gears, and new mechanics such as slipstream, toggle mode and so much more!

We also host online tournaments and other events for competitive players on our discord server so be sure to check all of that out!

JOIN THE NEW DISCORD: https://discord.gg/ScfgCx3WDP
New Twitter: https://twitter.com/exgearlabsSR
Website: https://www.exgearlabs.com/
Berserkerloop Wiki: https://berserkerloop.com/index.php/SRDX


Music used in this video (In order of appearance)
~Drift Line by Infraction

CREDITS:
Nadevan - Editing, Recording clips
Voui - Intro Animation
PixelBolt - Recording clips
AntiGeezas? - Recording clips
Salaga - Recording clips
Cybersonicstarzx655 - Thumbnail
Fordden - SRDX Logo

#sonicriders #sonicthehedgehog #modding #developer #replaceable #srdx #extremegearlabs #sonic
